basicInfo.name: Phoenix
basicInfo.flavor: As the ruler of all birds, the Phoenix is able to command all flocks. It does not consume lifeforms such as insects or plants to live, nor does it live in groups, making it a paragon for all monarchs.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 90% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 90% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Gaze of Dawn
Skill 1.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 75% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Defense Reduction. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 75% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Radiant Light
Skill 2.desc:
Self
 - Grants Crit Rate Boost. [Duration: 5 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Magic Damage Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Crit Rate Boost to 23%.

Passive.name: Rise From the Ashes
Passive.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants Magic Attack Boost. [Always Active].
 - Self
 - Revives with 60% HP upon falling in battle. [Once per Battle]

profile.story:
The Phoenix is a sacred beast that has lived in Aisha since ancient times.
It is tasked with guarding the sun that rises in the lands of Eastern Aisha, along with the dawn.
Because it is able to sustain itself by spreading its wings to embrace the rising sun, it does not consume plants or insects to survive.
Because it does not kill other lifeforms, the phoenix is considered to be a model of a benevolent and merciful ruler. As such, it is regarded as a noble bird in Aisha.

basicInfo.name: Phoenix
basicInfo.flavor: Having served as a protector of the eastern lands for a long time, the Phoenix is revered by the people as the Bird of the East.

basicInfo.name: Phoenix
basicInfo.flavor: Tasked with guarding the dawn, the Phoenix dwells in the east, where the sun rises. When the sun rises above the horizon, the Phoenix sings, and its call is said to resemble a bamboo flute's melody.
